Code.Name: Maritime transport
Code.Description: Transport of goods and/or persons is by sea

Code.Name: Rail transport
Code.Description: Transport of goods and/or persons is by rail

Code.Name: Road transport
Code.Description: Transport of goods and/or persons is by road

Code.Name: Air transport
Code.Description: Transport of goods and/or persons is by air

Code.Name: Mail
Code.Description: Method to convey goods is by mail

Code.Name: Multimodal transport
Code.Description: Method to convey goods and/or persons is by multimodal transport

Code.Name: Fixed transport installation
Code.Description: Transport of item is via a fixed transport installation

Code.Name: Inland water transport
Code.Description: Transport of goods and/or persons is by inland water

Code.Name: Transport mode not applicable
Code.Description: The mode of transport is not applicable
